summary.body: Can anyone recommend someone who can make very beautiful curtains quickly?  Curtains I currently have were made by Interior Options and I am happy with their work but would like to price competition also.   Thanks, JB
summary.subject: Curtains

summary.body: Has anyone used Quinn Interiors for blinds/reupholstering?  I need someone reliable and quick to respond for Tower Block flat.  Am looking for American type Silhouettes and darkening shades. Have used Denzils in years gone by, but would prefer someone else this time.
summary.subject: Curtain and Blind fitters

summary.body: Has anyone in one of the large studios acquired made-to-measure venetian blinds recently? I'm contemplating replacing the ready-mades in my flat since they don't cover the 3 small windows across the top, and the fit over the big windows isn't great either. Any info on costings would be very helpful. Many thanks!
summary.subject: Venetian blinds
